positions.title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Developing an end-to-end HR communication platform to improve internal workflows and data accessibility.
Implementing secure API endpoints and responsive frontend components used by HR administrators.
Utilizing Next.js for the frontend and Spring Boot for the backend services.
Participating in Agile ceremonies and collaborating with a team of developers.

positions.title: Full Stack Developer
description: Delivering end-to-end web development solutions for various clients, from concept to deployment.
Building custom e-commerce platforms with integrated payment gateways and user management.
Implementing smart automation pipelines using n8n to streamline client business operations and data syncing.
Consulting on tech stack selection and system architecture for scalable micro-services.
